channel.title: E-commerce growth on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in E-commerce growth on FinanClub

item.title: SHOP
item.description: score:33 Chances: The Federal Reserve may have finished raising interest rates, and that portends upward momentum in the stock market. Shopify (SHOP) reached $74.51 at the closing of the latest trading day, reflecting a +1.48% change compared to its last close. Discover how Shopify’s groundbreaking Black Friday success indicates it’s ready for the beginning of a retail transformation.

item.title: SE
item.description: score:-10 Chances: E-commerce share of global retail sales is above 20%, indicating significant growth potential for Sea Ltd. Growth stock investors could be in for an excellent year in 2024, suggesting positive prospects for Sea Ltd. Sea’s estimated fair value is US$73.00 based on 2 Stage Free Cash Flow to Equity, indicating potential for stock price appreciation.
